module.name: Core
module.changelog: *2.11.0.34* Add global for db *2.11.0.33* FREEPBX-8064 - escape values when adding or deleting adminstrative users, FREEPBX-7899 - get_config from core should be the last one called, as a result moving this to use a priority in module.xml with a high enough priority *2.11.0.32* #7899 - fix core_get_config priority *2.11.0.31* Part fix for #6923 language not being set. *2.11.0.27* FREEPBX-6914 Notify user when the callrecording module is not installed so they know not to press star 1 *2.11.0.26* FREEPBX-7422 Fix Japan Country Indication Tones *2.11.0.25* Set OUTBOUND_ROUTE_NAME to name of outbound route *2.11.0.24* update license file *2.11.0.21* #5698 #7317 *2.11.0.20* Fix last_id to use proper wrapper *2.11.0.19* Use Framework new wrapper function for last_id *2.11.0.18* #7202, #7231, add display of presence state in connectedline name, stop duplicate trigger events on advanced settings page, minor device and user mode fix, tidy up ancient checks in macro-user-callerid, helper for changes to cronmanager updated *2.11.0.17* Tidy up ancient checks in macro-user-callerid, add minor Device User Mode fix *2.11.0.16* Update Cron Manager settings when changed from advanced settings *2.11.0.15* #7202 Ensure MoH Variables are always set *2.11.0.14* Add option for displaying presence state in connectedline name *2.11.0.13* Fix for incorrectly parsed http.conf migration settings *2.11.0.12* Monitor Presence on extension hints *2.11.0.11* Added HTTP.conf to core *2.11.0.10* #6915, #6318, #6902 *2.11.0.9* #6993 Add new toll-free route to wizard *2.11.0.8* Dont generate SIP Secret if device was previously saved with no SIP Secret *2.11.0.7* #6786, #6462, #6922, #6345 *2.11.0.6* #6522, #6758, #6750, #6753 *2.11.0.5* #6760 *2.11.0.4* #6732, #6766 *2.11.0.3* #6147, #6681, #6731 *2.11.0.2* #6654, #6639, #6366 *2.11.0.1* #6535, #6604, #6576 *2.11.0.0* 2.11.0 final *2.11.0.0rc1.5* change dependency *2.11.0.0rc1.4* #6366, #6541 *2.11.0.0rc1.3* Fixes to gui_drawselects re #6541 *2.11.0.0rc1.2* Fixes #6446, queue recording *2.11.0.0rc1.1* at generation set rtp values if class is empty *2.11.0.0rc1.0* rtp.conf cleanup, misc *2.11.0.0beta2.7* Fixes #6459, #6237 call fails on internal pickup in ring group when call confirm is enabled *2.11.0.0beta2.6* r15400 *2.11.0.0beta2.5* r15308 *2.11.0.0beta2.4* Move control of rtp.conf and rtp_additional.conf into core re #6397 *2.11.0.0beta2.3* #5977, #6262, #6292, #6337 *2.11.0.0beta2.2* #5828, #6263 *2.11.0.0beta2.1* #6261 *2.11.0.0beta2.0* more on #5782, #6141, beta2
